content: निवेशः {@--1@} Entering, entrance. {@--2@} Encamping, halting. {@--3@} ({%a%}) A halting place, camp, encampment; सेनानिवेशं तुमुलं चकार <ls>R. 5. 49</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 2</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 40</ls>; <ls>Ki. 7. 27.</ls> {@--4@} A house, an abode, a dwelling; <ls>Ki. 4. 19.</ls> {@--5@} Expanse, contour (of the breast); <ls>Ki. 4. 8.</ls> {@--6@} Depositing, delivering. {@--7@} Marrying, marriage, settling in life. {@--8@} Impression, copy. {@--9@} Military array. {@--10@} Ornament, decoration. {@--11@} Founding (a town).
